original_text: Before this time, the Horites lived in Seir, but the descendants of Esau chased them away. They destroyed the Horites and they lived in their country. The Israelites did the same thing to the people who had lived in the land that the Lord gave to them.)
korean_text: 호리 사람도 세일에 거주하였는데 에서의 자손이 그들을 멸하고 그 땅에 거주하였으니 이스라엘이 여호와께서 주신 기업의 땅에서 행한 것과 같았느니라)

sentences.original_text: Before this time, the Horites lived in Seir
sentences.korean_translation: 이 시간 이전에, 호리 사람들은 세일에 살았다

sentences.original_text: but the descendants of Esau chased them away
and they lived in their country
The Israelites did the same thing
to the people who had lived in the land
that the Lord gave to them
